type: The type of scoring function. Valid values include magnitude, freshness, distance, and tag. The function type must be lower case.
boost: A multiplier for the raw score. Must be a positive number not equal to 1.0.
fieldName: The name of the field used as input to the scoring function.
interpolation: How boosting is interpolated across document scores; defaults to linear.
distance.boostingDistance: The distance in kilometers from the reference location where the boosting range ends.
distance.referencePointParameter: The name of the parameter passed in search queries to specify the reference location.
freshness.boostingDuration: The expiration period after which boosting will stop for a particular document (ISO 8601 duration, e.g. P30D).
magnitude.boostingRangeStart: The field value at which boosting starts.
magnitude.boostingRangeEnd: The field value at which boosting ends.
magnitude.constantBoostBeyondRange: Whether to apply a constant boost for field values beyond the range end value; default is false.
tag.tagsParameter: The name of the parameter passed in search queries to specify the list of tags to compare against the target field.
